title: GitLabForm configuration for skipping projects.
description: List of projects that will not be processed or updated by GitLabForm.

items.title: Project to be skipped.
items.description: Enter path to the project including full namespace.
items.comment: Minimum length is set to 3 because all projects must be under a group or namespace. The shortest value can be 'a/b', where 'a' is the group or namespace and 'b' is the project path.
